people_also_ask.question: Is Smash Melee a good game?
people_also_ask.heading: Yep, Super Smash Bros Melee is a great fun party game to play with your friends. There are 14 new characters, and 26 overall. ... But aside from those two problems, Melee is a great fun game to play, and hands down one of the best Gamecube games of all time.
people_also_ask.title: Kid reviews for Super Smash Bros. Melee - Common Sense ...

people_also_ask.question: How do you melee in Smash Bros?
people_also_ask.heading: Unlike other games of the same genre, in which moves are entered by button-input combinations, most moves in Super Smash Bros. Melee can be accessed via one-button presses and a joystick direction.
